sqlMap.select: select a.menu_id "id", a.menu_pid "pid", menu_name "text", b.menu_id "id2" from (select distinct (m.menu_id) menu_id, m.menu_name menu_name, menu_order, m.menu_pid menu_pid from sc_menu m) a left join (select menu_id from role_menu_rela where role_id = #role_id#) b on a.menu_id = b.menu_id order by a.menu_order, a.menu_id
